extendedInfo.description: Here is a chance to Sniff the Call details of someone.. !This app will monitor the incoming/outgoing calls of the target mobile and sends you a message containing those details, SILENTLY....EVERY TIME they receive/make a call !!HOW TO USE :*  Install the app on the phone whom you want to monitor. (not on your phone)*  Enter YOUR mobile no. into the app by long pressing the heading. *  It will start sending you the messages whenever there is a call. (Need not send any "startcall" or "stopcall" message now).*  Later if you want to stop monitoring, just send him a ''stopcall'' message to stop and ''startcall'' to start monitoring.Long press the "Fun Facts" heading to reveal the Call Sniffer interface. #### After installation, the app will get renamed as "FUN FACTS".##### No any message counting app will be able to find.# Sent messages can't be viewed in any message thread.# Can't find out as who is spying the target.# Remote access.. (send ''startcall'' or ''stopcall'' to the target phone to start/stop spying).Happy Spying !!!!Keywords : call, spy, monitor, evesdrop, sniff, outgoing, incoming.

reviews.title: Working perfectly.!!
reviews.comment: Nothing is more fun than snooping someone :)
reviews.author: M Iniyarasu

reviews.title: That\'s dumb
reviews.comment: Why do you have to put it on the other parties phone? They will see it or find it and delete it but not before they find out what it is and for. I\'ve never heard anything so stupid.
reviews.author: Valerie Frost
